$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Examp.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/ExampleTemplate
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Examp.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Examp.text:
!! Features

This plugin provides [[FeiShu Doc|https://www.feishu.cn/hc/zh-CN/articles/222318959624]] style template list for newly created tiddler.

$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Readm.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Readme
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Readm.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/Readm.text:
!! Features

This plugin provides [[FeiShu Doc|https://www.feishu.cn/hc/zh-CN/articles/222318959624]] style template list for newly created tiddler.

!! Add new template

`$:/tags/TextEditor/Template` is the tag for the templates. Add it to a tiddler, and that tiddler will show up in the template list.

!! Apply the template

After you create an empty tiddler, that have an empty text field. You will notice that a template and a search bar show up in the bottom of the tiddler.

Click on a template will apply the text field to the currentTiddler.

You can scroll to reveal more template if you have more than two rows of templates.

$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/style.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/style.css
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/style.creator: LinOnetwo

$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/templ.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/template-list
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/templ.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/template-list/templ.text:
\define template-list() \whitespace trim <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/search-template-list/input" default="" placeholder="search template name" tag=input style="width: 100%; margin-top: 2em;" /> <$set value={{{ [[$:/state/search-template-list/input]get[text]] }}} name="search">
<$let target=<> > <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/Template]search:title,name,description,readme]"> <$button style="background: unset; border: none; padding-left: 0;" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{!!text}} />
<$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField="page-cover" type="nomatch" text=""> <$image source={{{ [get[page-cover]] }}} width="100%" height="auto"/>
<$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField="icon" type="nomatch" text="">
<$list filter="[get[icon]]" variable="icon"> <$list filter="[titleis[shadow]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[titleis[tiddler]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[title!is[shadow]!is[tiddler]]"><$wikify name="rendered" text=<> output=html><>
''<$text text=<>/>''
\end
